name: Clipper
body:
###Features:

* Easily shoot and share screenshots with Clipper and [ImageShack](https://imageshack.com/).
  Screenshots can also be saved into specified local directory.
* Tired of long URLs? Shorten links with [Google Link Shortener](http://goo.gl).
* Rapidly share text or code snippets with [TinyPaste](http://tny.cz).
* Quickly convert anything possible into QR codes via [QRickit](http://qrickit.com).
* Copy multiple text pieces, which will be automerged and placed into clipboard.
* Track and save your clipboard history. You will never lose something important!

###Platforms:

* Linux
* Windows

###Prebuild binaries:

* [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/falceeffect/Clipper/releases)

###Building from source code:

Run following commands from 'Clipper/src' directory.

* `./configure`
* `make`
* `sudo make install`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
